column4: ï»¿my bf did something to my ubuntu machine a while back to make it boot into the 18 kernel, because virtualbox wasn't available for the 19 kernel at the time. now that it is available, what do I change to boot into the 19 now?
If you have the 19 kernel installed, then the menu.lst would be what to edit.
install "ubuntu-desktop", to get rid of kde as well... follow this
